ygData.msgSnippet: Recently I tried to evolve network that could implement XOR operation and added one extra input. Algorithm failed in approximately 10 runs. It s really weird.

Recently I tried to evolve network that could implement XOR operation
and added one extra input. Algorithm failed in approximately 10 runs.
It's really weird. As I didn't use NEAT it would be great if someone
could check this problem out with NEAT.

Training sample:

x1  x2  x3   y
0    0    0    0
0    1    0    1
1    0    0    1
1    1    0    0
